info.feature1Text: Create an unlimited number of grocery lists for any occasion. Add infinite products and keep everything organized in one place.
info.feature2Text: Easily share your lists with others. Collaborate in real-time and see instantly which groceries are already in the basket. Perfect for households!
info.feature3Text: Add your loyalty cards, receipts, or other important cards to the app. This way, you have everything at hand and never miss out again.
info.feature4Text: The app learns from your habits and provides smart suggestions for products you frequently buy. You'll never forget anything again.
info.feature5Text: All your lists, products, and cards are securely stored on your personal account. Available anytime, anywhere.

# üìÑ Terms of Use & Privacy Policy ‚Äì Grocery List

**Latest version:** 1.2  
**Last updated:** 10-11-2025 16:30

---

## 1. About this application
This application ("Grocery List") is a personal web application that allows users to create, view, share, edit, and delete grocery lists.

The application is developed for personal use and aims to make managing groceries more organized.

---

## 2. Application administrator
The application is managed by the developer of Grocery List ("Administrator").

For questions, you can contact the email address listed in the application.

---

# üîí Privacy Policy

## 3. What data is collected
When creating an account, the following personal data is stored:
- Name
- Email address
- Password (securely hashed with a cryptographic algorithm)

Additionally, the following data you add yourself is stored:
- Grocery lists (and shared lists)
- Products you add
- Photos you upload (optional)

---

## 4. Purposes of data processing
Data is only processed to:
- allow users to log in securely via Laravel Sanctum,
- correctly assign shared lists to the right users,
- guarantee the operation of the grocery list functionality,
- display notifications within the app.

No data is **sold, shared, or passed on to third parties**.

---

## 5. Data security
- Passwords are never stored in plain text, but securely hashed using Laravel‚Äôs built-in hashing mechanisms (bcrypt/argon2).
- Data traffic between frontend (Nuxt) and backend (Laravel Sanctum API) is encrypted via HTTPS.
- Only authorized users have access to their own data.
- Uploads (such as photos) are securely stored and are only visible to users with access to the relevant list.

---

## 6. Responsibility for photos
Users are responsible for the content of the photos they upload. It is not allowed to upload photos that:
- are copyright protected without permission,
- are offensive, discriminatory, or insulting,
- contain personal data of third parties without their consent.

The Administrator reserves the right to remove content in case of abuse.

---

## 7. Sharing lists
The application allows you to share lists with other registered users.
Only users you explicitly add have access to that list.
You can stop sharing or delete the list at any time.

---

## 8. Retention period and deletion of data
Users can delete their account and all associated data at any time.
After deletion, all data (lists, products, photos, and shared data) is permanently removed from the database.
Only emails already sent via the administrator‚Äôs Gmail account cannot be deleted, as they are outside the application.

---

## 9. Cookies and local storage
The application only uses technical cookies or localStorage to retain session information (such as authentication via Sanctum or preferences).
No **tracking or advertising cookies** are used.

---

## 10. Your rights
You have the right to:
- request access to your stored data,
- correct or delete your data,
- terminate your account.

For questions, you can contact the administrator via the contact address in the application.

---

## 11. Changes
The administrator may change these terms and privacy policy when the operation of the application changes.
For important changes, you will be informed within the application and can accept the new terms again.

---

# ‚öñÔ∏è Terms of Use

## 12. Use of the application
- You may only use the application for personal, non-commercial use.
- You are responsible for the content you add.
- The administrator is not liable for data loss, malfunctions, or misuse of login details by third parties.

---

## 13. Acceptance
By creating an account or logging in, you declare that you:
- have read these Terms of Use and Privacy Policy,
- agree to them, and
- are over 16 years old (or have permission from a parent/guardian).

---

## 14. Applicable law
These terms are governed by Dutch law.
Any disputes will be submitted exclusively to the competent court in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

---

## 14a. International users
The application is developed and hosted in the Netherlands and is subject to Dutch and European (GDPR) law.
Users who use the application from other countries do so on their own initiative and responsibility.
By using the application, they agree that only Dutch law applies and that no appeal can be made to local legislation or consumer protection outside the Netherlands or the European Union.

---

The application is provided ‚Äúas is,‚Äù without any guarantee of uninterrupted or error-free operation.

The Administrator reserves the right to:

In such cases, the Administrator is not obliged to restore or recover user data that has been deleted or lost as a result.

### 17. Termination of the service
The Administrator may modify, suspend, or permanently discontinue the application or any of its features at any time, with or without notice.
If the service is discontinued, all user data will be permanently deleted from the database in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
